name: Ever seed
description:
A game about precisely growing a plant and eating light orbs to grow longer before falling into a seed again. 

Your flower head his fragile so don't hit in anything. Get the highest score!

A/D, arrow or mouse to move

space or enter to pause or restart

made in 3 days for Brackey GameJam "An end in a new beggining" with GameMaker Studio 2

With more time I would have add: upgrade, more enemy, more obstacle, music, better control and a better difficulty curve
